title: humaninteractive machine learning engines
extract: Posted by: Margaret Rouse. Contributor(s): Ed Burns. Machine learning (ML) is a category of algorithm that allows software applications to become more accurate in predicting outcomes without being explicitly programmed.
extract_html: Posted by: Margaret Rouse. Contributor(s): Ed Burns. Machine learning (ML) is a category of algorithm that allows software applications to become more accurate in predicting outcomes without being explicitly programmed.
